section.title: Bug Reporting and Other Feedback
section.para: The skit developers welcome feedback. If you like skit, if you don't, if you want new features, if the documentation sucks, if you've found a bug, or if you'd like to get involved, we'd like to hear from you. Email us at skit-general@lists.pgfoundry.org.
If skit fails to do what it claims, that is a bug. If it does something unexpected, and you don't like it, that may also be a bug. If it generates ugly or poor-performing DDL that may be a bug.
If you find a bug, we want to hear from you.
